source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video captures a scenic view of the northern lights (aurora borealis) illuminating the night sky above a snowy landscape with a small building and trees. The green lights create a striking contrast against the dark, starry sky. The scene is tranquil and atmospheric.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video captures a scenic view of the northern lights (aurora borealis) illuminating the night sky above a snowy landscape with a small building and trees. The green lights create a striking contrast against the dark, starry sky. The scene is tranquil and atmospheric.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly describes a static scene, failing to mention the primary motion in the video. It should be revised to describe the movement of the northern lights. The video is a time-lapse showing the green aurora borealis shifting, brightening, and moving in bands across the night sky. The caption also includes subjective adjectives like "striking," "tranquil," and "atmospheric," and describes static elements like the "small building and trees," all of which should be removed to comply with the instructions to focus solely on motion.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video shows the green aurora borealis shifting, brightening, and moving in bands across the night sky.
